source: Ikigai Consultation Spreadsheet - Mars Phase Description

Inception.description: Trusting and acting on one's essential, even pre-cognitive, instincts; speaking up for oneself; not taking challenges personally but as motivators for improvement; strengthening self-confidence; challenged by issues of isolation.

Preparation.description: Fleshing out personal intentions or goals; working behind the scenes; learning proper preparation in one's plans; opening to working with others; facing lack of confidence; dealing with others' rules; balancing private and social.

Emergence.description: Awakening one's individual intentions for improving society by one's instinctual wisdom; strives to be first, original, to bring things into the open; strong exterior/external orientation to things; natural risk-takers; drive to be first.

Exploration.description: Widely exploring one's agency, the reach of one's effectiveness; needs lots of time for experimentation/experience to grow knowledge; instinct into informed choices; themes of personal growth emerge; challenged to accept.

Identity Challenge.description: Transforming personal challenges into societal contributions; meeting internal and external challenges to freedom of action; learning to surrender the battle for the larger goal; increasing energetic vitality; ego drive needs less.

Maturity.description: Increasing the relevancy and influence of one's individual contribution to the world; 'early adulthood'; increasing self-responsibility; learning authentic commitment; strong attraction to finding purpose through work/contribution.

Transcendence.description: Re-envisioning a better future; radical commitment to one's authentic vision; learning to be a vehicle for a greater message; accessing spiritual dimensions or 'peak' experiences; challenged to find balance in outer and inner.

Re-Orientation.description: Re-building or re-framing one's identity to better participate in society; learning adjustment and flexibility; gestation of new social identity; challenged by under-confidence; integrating external information overt or discreet; rising.

Resurgence.description: Initial mobilizing of personal dharma; drive to prove or improve oneself; strong need to engage in meaningful things; requires a social context to actualize; discovering longer-term thinking and/or planning; challenged with impatience.

Destiny Challenge.description: Deep reconciling to something bigger than them; compelled to act on deeper Desire; major transformations around Life Purpose for societal gain; life lessons must be embodied not only intellectualized; challenged to reach further.

Service.description: You're a natural leader. You want to align your personal beliefs with societal ethics. You want to use your agency to help other people. When you feel overwhelmed, rest and take a deep breath, step back. You are here to make a difference. Actualizing and refining one's personal dharmic vision within societal reality; natural leadership; personal beliefs aligning with social ethics; learning to wield one's social equity for non-personal goals; issues of overwhelm and boundaries.

Elder.description: Orchestrating efforts and actions for longer-range societal benefit; relinquishing personal ideas about what's needed for greater good; willing to see what is rather than what one wants; embodying the bigger imagination needed.

Transition.description: Bringing social potential into matter; fuller being-ness replaces excess doing-ness; easier access to big picture; ensuring continuity through personal efforts; challenged to translate deep, long-range wisdom in pragmatic ways.
